subject: PAYMENT MANDATE
body:
Dear Colette ,
        my bank , Wells Fargo bank has received a payment mandate of the 
sum of $11.5M from Martin Gruenberg of FDIC, London in your favor .
Having already entered into and secured Deposit Guarantee Insurance to 
ensure a hitch transfer , kindly furnish me with your relevant bank and 
personal details for immediate release of your fund and you reserve the 
right to indicate how you want to be paid .
This payment has already been appropriated from government consolidated 
bank account with this bank .
I wait for your urgent response .
Charlie  Scharf

subject: Re: Fwd: PAYMENT MANDATE
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better.

Just a quick note, though, I'd prefer not to share any personal information at this stage. Hope that's okay with you. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Colette

subject: Re: Fwd: PAYMENT MANDATE
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Colette

subject: Re: Fwd: PAYMENT MANDATE
body:
Dear Colette I will respond accordingly in few hours time
Charlie  Scharf

subject: Re: Fwd: PAYMENT MANDATE
body:
Dear Colette ,
       did you receive my mail that I sent earlier to you .
Charlie  Scharf
